'''The Light of Day''' contains [[Achievements]] related to [[Exploration]] in [[Enkanomiya]], [[Inazuma]]. After completion it awards the [[Inazuma: Tokoyo]] [[Namecard]].

[[Chests]], [[Seelie]], and [[Time Trial Challenge]]s in the [[Three Realms Gateway Offering/Area|Three Realms Gateway Offering]] event area do not count towards these achievements.
